entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus
Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

🌍Updates: 15 NY children diagnosed with syndrome possibly tied to COVID-19

entity.name: Covid-19: Lote com 600 litros de insumos para fabricação da Coronavac chega a SP
entity.description:
Segundo o governador de São Paulo, João Doria, a matéria-prima pode virar até 1 milhão de doses contra o coronavírus.

text: Many of these 100,000 were healthy or doing fine before they got COVID19. They had families and friends, who were largely not allowed to be with their loved ones when they died. A really tragic part of this epidemic.2/x
